name: Office Christmas Party
description: When his uptight CEO sister threatens to shut down his branch, the branch manager throws an epic Christmas party in order to land a big client and save the day, but the party gets way out of hand...
keywords: christmas,christmas party,sex on a desk,woman photocopying her breasts,group sex

review.author: erikhachmang
review.heading: For a tacky Christmas Comedy it was pretty flawless
review.reviewBody:
Nothing nothing awkward or cheesy. Perfectly paced, perfect characther building in such a short amount of time. Perfectly timed and subtle jokes and pretty great acting.

Even the hundreds of extra's were flawlessly directed.

Good laughs and no restrictons. They went all out in a very un-American way.

Kudos to the director.
